title: Bitter Chocolate Kiss
description:
Oneshots collection:

1) Yasashii Tsuki Ni Dakarete (Embraced by a Kind Moon)
Fumiya has only recently come to realise his true orientation - but finds it hard to accept. As a result he is unable to hold down a relationship and has an issue becoming physically intimate with anyone. Can his neighbour (and almost-stalker) help him overcome his issues?

4) Cross
Jun, a tattoo artist, meets Yuu, a young man who seems to want pain. But what is the reason and should Jun really act on Yuu's wishes?

5) Kimi ni Au Tame ni (So I can meet you)
A writer has problems getting over the loss of a pet, then he meets a man who has the same name as his dog...

6) Hajimemashite (Nice to Meet You)
Rei gets dumped guys who only seem to be "bi-curious"...
